testUtterance: Detta är ett danskt rösttest för att kontrollera kvaliteten på det som produceras.

voices.label: Christel
voices.name: Microsoft Christel Online (Natural) - Danish (Denmark)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. Unlike some of the other voices ranked at the top of that list, it's not available to be installed on Windows yet.

voices.label: Jeppe
voices.name: Microsoft Jeppe Online (Natural) - Danish (Denmark)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. Unlike some of the other voices ranked at the top of that list, it's not available to be installed on Windows yet.

voices.label: Helle
voices.name: Microsoft Helle - Danish (Denmark)
voices.note: This voices is pre-loaded in Windows 10 and 11. While it's nowhere nearly as good as Microsoft's Natural Voices, it's good to have this voice listed as a fallback

voices.label: Kvindestemme 1
voices.name: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google da-dk-x-kfm-network
voices.note: This pre-loaded voice on ChromeOS is tied to the Android compatibility layer and requires network access for this version, which is very much a requirement for using Chrome OS anyway. Fallbacks to offline variant as well.
altNames: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google da-dk-x-kfm-local

voices.label: Kvindestemme 2
voices.name: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google da-dk-x-sfp-network
voices.note: This pre-loaded voice on ChromeOS is tied to the Android compatibility layer and requires network access for this version, which is very much a requirement for using Chrome OS anyway. Fallbacks to offline variant as well.
altNames: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google da-dk-x-sfp-local

voices.label: Kvindestemme 3
voices.name: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google da-dk-x-vfb-network
voices.note: This pre-loaded voice on ChromeOS is tied to the Android compatibility layer and requires network access for this version, which is very much a requirement for using Chrome OS anyway. Fallbacks to offline variant as well.
altNames: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google da-dk-x-vfb-local

voices.label: Mandsstemme
voices.name: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google da-dk-x-nmm-network
voices.note: This pre-loaded voice on ChromeOS is tied to the Android compatibility layer and requires network access for this version, which is very much a requirement for using Chrome OS anyway. Fallbacks to offline variant as well.
altNames: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google da-dk-x-nmm-local

voices.label: Dansk stemme
voices.name: dansk Danmark
voices.note: On Android, voice selection is only supported at a system level and Web Speech API doesn't return a true list of voices available, just a list of languages and regions
